rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0001
rows.name: Did you retrieve it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0002
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0003
rows.name: Is that so... I'll send it for analysis immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0004
rows.name: Please wait, Commander Vandham![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We need to rescue Lao-san.
He is at the Growth's stronghold on Black Steel Continent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Are you serious?
That guy is a traitor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Even you guys were set up by him in Shiraki no Tairiku!
Are you saying you'll save a guy like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0008
rows.name: That's true, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Vandham, he is also a victim.
You know about Lao, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0010
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0011
rows.name: The Earth Life Colonization Project[ST:wide ]â€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0012
rows.name: When this plan was established, cases like Lao's were anticipated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0013
rows.name: In fact, not just Lao, but Irina also lost her younger brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0014
rows.name: However, even so, we chose to ensure humanity's survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0015
rows.name: But Irina is different from him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0016
rows.name: Even now, she carries out missions as a BLADE for the sake of humanity's survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0017
rows.name: Is that so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0018
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0019
rows.name: Gwin-san mentioned it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0020
rows.name: That the Lieutenant always pushes herself recklessly alone, jumping into death traps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0021
rows.name: As if she wants to die...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0023
rows.name: The method of expression is different, but the feelings are all the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0024
rows.name: Of course, what Lao did is not something that can be forgiven, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Understood.
I'll arrange it immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0026
rows.name: Commander Vandham, thank you very much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0027
rows.name:
It's not something to be thanked for.
I just felt like punching him with my own hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11110100_MSG0028
rows.name:
The analysis will take a while.
Let's return to the BLADE Home for now.[ST:wait ]
